Package fi.cs.helsinki.glindstr.soccerdb.dao

Interface Summary
BaseDao<T> An interface for database operations.
GameDao An interface for database operations on the game table.
LeagueDao An interface for database operations on the league table.
MembershipDao An interface for database operations on the membership table.
SeasonDao An interface for database operations on the season table.
StandingsDao An interface for retrieving the standings from the database.
TeamDao An interface for database operations on the team table.
UserDao An interface for database operations on the users table.
 

Class Summary
GameDaoImpl This class provides database access for the game table.
LeagueDaoImpl This class provides database access for the league table.
MembershipDaoImpl This class provides database access for the membership table.
SeasonDaoImpl This class provides database access for the season table.
StandingsDaoImpl This class retrieves the standings from the database.
TeamDaoImpl This class provides database access for the team table.
UserDaoImpl This class provides database access for the user registration function.
